revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Silph Co |image = [[File:Silph Co.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of Silph Co. |tokens = 875 |location = Saffron City }} The '''Silph Co''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 10,515 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
